attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to encourage employers to employ over 50s british workers.  We have a wealth of experiance and some of us are not being given help with day to day living.  We need to work we want to work.   We are not all bored teenagers we are bored older 'workers' some of us wanting to get on the housing ladder!  We are being discriminated despite government ledgislation on ageism.
